title: DPRK Operatives Impersonate Professionals on LinkedIn to Infiltrate Companies
description: The information technology (IT) workers associated with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) are now applying to remote positions using real LinkedIn accounts of individuals they're impersonating, marking a new escalation of the fraudulent scheme.
